   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Enpowring Epidemic Modling with EpiLearn!
===================================

Epilearn is a pytorch library built for epidemic modeling, providing abundant tools quickly construct and test epidemic models.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Installation
